items.sentence: Could you please tell me again how many times you\'ve been here?
Everyone must obey the rules. Those who don\'t will be punished.
Tom got Mary to scratch the part of his back he couldn\'t reach.
Tom thinks that schools should teach children to obey authority.
Tom thought Mary was in Boston, but she was actually in Chicago.
Tom took an envelope out of his briefcase and handed it to Mary.
Tom took off his coat because it was getting too hot to wear it.
I\'d like to have a word with you about what happened yesterday.
I\'ve finished translating everything you asked me to translate.
There are usually between two and five lunar eclipses each year.
